title: A New path
creator_contributor_role: Hector Waldron Pride Charitable Trust, partner
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Melbourne Legacy
abstract: I realised pretty quickly that I worked for an organisation that really cares about what they do.
description: After realising that something was missing in her corporate job, Verity took a short term contract with Legacy and has been with them ever since. She talks about the care, diligence and passion of her fellow workmates and how working for Legacy has brought her closer to her own family and her family's history.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001776; Living Legacy : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2009
